name: LowPolis
description:
Strategy game with nice, low poly styled, graphics. Build your city and make your people happy, give them food and everything else what they need. Current game version offers only II lvls of civilians. More basic informations about how to play - readme file. 

Incomming features:

  • finished UI and descriptions
  • sound effects and music
  • more friendly road placement system
  • more animations
  • III lvl
  • trade panel
  • more maps and ingame tutorial
  • balance
  • enemies

EDIT 18.06.2018:

  1.  Destroy system fix
  2.  Selection system fix
  3.  Small UI changes
